00020 
00021 namespace omega
00022 {
00023 namespace ui
00024 {
00026         class WidgetFactory
00027         {
00028         public:
00029                 virtual Widget* createWidget(omega::String name, Widget* parent)
00030                 {
00031                         Widget* widget = new Widget(name);
00032                         parent->addChild(widget);
00033                         return widget;
00034                 }
00035 
00036                 virtual Box* createBox(omega::String name, Widget* parent, Box::Layout layout)
00037                 {
00038                         Box* box = new Box(name, layout);
00039                         parent->addChild(box);
00040                         return box;
00041                 }
00042 
00043                 virtual Button* createButton(omega::String name, Widget* parent)
00044                 {
00045                         Button* button = new Button(name);
00046                         parent->addChild(button);
00047                         return button;
00048                 }
00049 
00050                 virtual Slider* createSlider(omega::String name, Widget* parent)
00051                 {
00052                         Slider* slider = new Slider(name);
00053                         parent->addChild(slider);
00054                         return slider;
00055                 }
00056 
00057                 virtual Image* createImage(omega::String name, Widget* parent)
00058                 {
00059                         Image* image = new Image(name);
00060                         parent->addChild(image);
00061                         return image;
00062                 }
00063         };
00064 }; // namespace ui
00065 }; // namespace omega

00067 #endif
